title: The Ultimate Confidence & Ego Boost
description: In this audio from the The Ultimate series, international bestselling mind power author Stephen Richards has developed one of the most powerful ways to help you to build confidence and assertiveness. You will become more self-assured and your sense of efficacy will increase. Your ability to make your own decisions and get more satisfaction out of life will improve dramatically.Faith and trust are the mainstay of confidence, you will be more able to resist the pressure and dominance of excessively dominant people. This helps instil faith in you that your own abilities and style will ultimately work if you let them. This groundbreaking brainwave technology does not use self-hypnosis or subliminal messaging. In less than 30 minutes the main track will open your eyes and give you the confidence to inspire confidence in others: your audience, your peers, your boss, your customers, and your friends.Now with this technology you can be instilled with a tremendous amount of confidence so that you can do what you believe to be right, even if others mock or criticise you for it. You will be able to go the extra mile to achieve better things, and even for you to admit your mistakes and vowing to learn from them.The purpose of the technology is not so much about reprogramming yourself, but itâ€™s about teaching our mind how to do things differently. This audio uses techniques that get right to the core of the problem, and in rapid time. Using up to date methods of paraliminals with brainwave technology this audio overcomes the need to use self-hypnosis. The best time to listen to this is through the daytime, or when you are alert. For the best results it is advisable to listen to this audio through stereo headphones. Please ensure you know which part of the earpiece set is for the left and right ear, and wear accordingly. However, if you are left handed reverse the headset, so that the right earpiece is in or over your left ear, and the left earpiece is over or in your right ear.
author: Stephen Richards
